means: 再发生，复发( recur的现在分词 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: 集团过去四年都把经常性(recurring)盈利的100％以上用为派发股息。管理层在为较长期的增长策略获取业绩的同时，相信集团也将能 …

the distributing regulation of the shortest linear recurring length over the finite field ., 有限域上定长序列的最短线性递归长度分布.

，以及可重复增加的收入（recurring revenue）。这意味着你要放弃那些需要12个月的时间来完成定单1亿5千万辆汽车。
recurring continued fraction 循环连分数recurring series 循环级数recursion 递归

entry.def: If something recurs, it happens more than once.

example.ex: ...a theme that was to recur frequently in his work.
example.tran: 一个在他的作品中反复出现的主题

example.ex: ...a recurring nightmare she has had since childhood.
example.tran: 一个从她童年起就不断出现的噩梦

Sentence.sentence: A recurring criticism of the UK's university sector is its perceived weakness in translating new knowledge into new products and services.
